member.summary: Download Session class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the download Session Id - comes from sync server.

member.summary: Gets or sets the job ID for the download session.

member.summary: Gets or sets the job description for the download session.

member.summary: Gets or sets the file size.

member.summary: Gets or sets the checksum.

member.summary: Gets or sets the terminal identifier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSession.DateRequested
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the download is requested.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSession.DateDownloaded
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when downloaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSession.DateApplied
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the session is applied.

member.summary: Gets or sets the status: DownloadSessionStatus.

member.summary: Gets or sets the message string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus
member.summary: DownloadSessionStatus indicates session download status.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Started
member.summary: A session creation is started.
member.remarks: This status is used by AX to indicate that a download session job has started processing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Available
member.summary: A download session is Available.
member.remarks: A session is in Available status when download session data file is created and meta data information is available in database.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Requested
member.summary: A request is submitted to download session file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Downloaded
member.summary: All session related files are downloaded by a client.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Applied
member.summary: A session is downloaded and applied successfully by a client.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.Canceled
member.summary: A download session is canceled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.CreateFailed
member.summary: A download session failed to be created successfully.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.DownloadFailed
member.summary: Failed to download a session's data file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.DownloadSessionStatus.ApplyFailed
member.summary: A session failed to apply the data on the client side.

member.summary: Unknown status.

member.summary: A session is in Created status when it is first created.

member.summary: All session related files are applied to Retail Server database.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OfflineUploadSessionStatus.ApplyFailed
member.summary: A session failed to apply the data on the Retail Server database.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus
member.summary: OnlineUploadSessionStatus indicates upload session status in AX and channel database.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus.Started
member.summary: Unknown status.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus.Available
member.summary: The upload session status when it is first created.

member.summary: The status indicating file is uploaded to Azure blob storage.

member.summary: The status indicating upload session is applied in AX database.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The status indicating upload session is canceled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus.UploadFailed
member.summary: The status indicating file failed to upload to Azure blob storage.

member.summary: The status indicating file failed to apply to AX database.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.CommerceDataExchange.AsyncClient.Business.OnlineUploadSessionStatus.ReadFailed
member.summary: The status indicating data failed to be retrieved from channel database.
